attributes.action: Immediatley dissolve this parliament as it's reputation is so tarnished it no longer commands the respect of the British People.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the most shocking revelations regarding MP's expenses this Parliament must now be dissolved to allow the British People the choose their own representatives and remove members who have behaved disgracefully.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
